message: Let's be fair and split it 60-40. I think this is a reasonable offer considering the inflation rates.
I appreciate your offer, but I think we can both do better.  I'm proposing a 60/40 split in my favor, considering the higher inflation rate I'll be facing. Let's reach a fair deal.
